data.author: Cody Doremus

changelog.release_notes: Bug fix: Properly checking if images exist so I don't make double and I only delete created images.

Black on Orange or Black on White version of Precisioneer Lite. Menu icons and names are being adjusted so that my watchfaces are more easily identifiable. The shrunk screenshot is not super helpful if you are switching between the full and lite versions to save battery or get more information.

data.description:
Like the Precisioneer layout but are away from your charger and need to cut down on battery consumption? Use Precisioneer Lite. This is the "Light" version. Orange on Black is available in the "Dark" version.

No weather or settings but still with the short long short vibration for a phone disconnect and battery monitoring.

Special icon when the Battery is charging.

AM/PM only shows up in 12 hour format.

VCR_OSD_MONO by Riciery Leal

Give it a heart of you like it!

latest_release.release_notes: Bug fix: Properly checking if images exist so I don't make double and I only delete created images.

data.title: Precisioneer Lite: Light
